nodes.title: Add version to the runtime dependency
Tweak grammar in Persisted Queries doc
[Build scripts] make the project compile with jdk13
[apollo-normalized-cache] Convert remaining Java classes to Kotlin
Fix potential issue with GraphQL source builder indents
[Runtime] deprecate the "builder" methods on `ApolloCall` and add them on the `Builder` instead
[LruNormalizedCache] Fix a most likely Java -> Kotlin conversion error
[Kotlin Runtime] do not close the Websocket too early
Allow calls to WebSocketSubscriptionTransport#send when not connected.
Enable SDL schema Apollo Plugin support
Corrects #2620 - Improper wrapper in forEach lambda.
[Plugin] Write operationOutput.json even if there are duplicateIds
[Runtime] add a client awareness OkHttp interceptor
Fix some log calls that use operations
[Publishing] Minor fixes to publishing after release 2.4.0
Replace old Kotlin codegen code with new one.
Update CI to use `main` instead of `master`
Clean up tests from Java fixtures
update LICENSE with new organization name
add Kotlin as language for the codeblock
Add a link to the Kotlin slack
[Plugin] Add an option to fail on deprecated usages
Deprecate toDeferred and toJob in favor of await.
[FileUpload] Allow to encode custom scalar types as null and use it for file uploads
[Sdl] Fix a scalar definition after a union defintion
Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile integration for iOS targer
[Compiler] fix optional Int properties with an uppercase name
[Build scripts] Use the mpp plugin, even in jvm modules
[Plugin] allow running the plugin on Gradle 5.6
[SQLNormalizedCache] fix watcher not called on initial cache write
Fixes small typo in rxjava2 docs
[Kotlin Runtime] do not use Java8 forEach

Have chained LRU cache example memory size in line with standalone sample
[Plugin] better error message for multiple schemas

Introduce new codegen AST (frontend) to support fragment as interfaces

[apollo-api] prefix Boolean Kotlin properties with `is` for better java interop

Fix issue with using inline fragment inside another inline fragment
Move generated adapters to `.adapter` package name
Another attempt at publishing from CI

Open some classes from the apollo-http-cache and apollo-http-cache-api modules
Adding test coverage to the LruNormalizedCache

[Codegen] Allow default value for non nullable variables

Fix potential crash on Android regarding forEach usage
Introduce custom error for cache miss
[Doc] for Java users, put Groovy first for Gradle configuration
[codegen] use schemaName when writing the actual GraphQL value

[Codegen] disable parsing of default variables for now

Fix `downloadApolloSchema` regression when there are multiple compilationUnits
Adds documentation whem using apollo with the -native-mt branch of co…
unconditionnaly add the message to the Kotlin Decprecated annotation
[Gradle Plugin] improve `downloadApolloSchema` for projects with variants
Add support for default variable values.
Change the way how name for fragment types generated
Add support for `@deprecated` directive without any deprecation reason

[SDL] allow to have schemas without mutations/subscriptions

🍂 3.0.0 fall cleanup of the Gradle Plugin 🍂
[Java codegen] Do not try to annotate primitive types in List type parameters
Remove operation generic type argument for wrap data API.
Enforce __typename to be the first requested field in the selection set
Introduce new response reader API to support reading from stream - part1
Fix Missing Referenced Fragments in Query Document
fix the license url and a few other dangling urls after the `master` ->`main` move

[3.x] Store more type information in ResponseField

Removing deprecated charset=utf-8 from Content-Type header
configure the Kotlin compiler options for multiplatform projects

Make parse / composeRequestBody as extension functions
